recommendations.title: Use a codemod for automated migration
recommendations.description: Consider using a codemod tool to automate the migration from lodash to lodash-es.
recommendations.implementation:
# Example using jscodeshift with a custom transform
    npx jscodeshift -t transform-lodash-imports.js ./src
    
    # Or a more manual approach with search and replace
    find ./src -type f -name "*.ts" | xargs sed -i 's/require(['"]lodash['"]);/import _ from "lodash-es";/g'

recommendations.title: Update tsconfig.json for proper ESM support
recommendations.description: Ensure your TypeScript configuration properly supports ES modules.
